text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/82db31c10470b0e27d7039d15c32ed7e9417cc02|patch 8.2.2491: popup window for text property may show in first scre…>
patch 8.2.2491: popup window for text property may show in first screen line

Problem:    Popup window for text property may show in first screen line.
Solution:   If the text position is invisible do not show the popup window.
            (closes #7807)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2491: popup window for text property may show in first scre… · vim/vim@82db31c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2491: popup window for text property may show in first scre… · vim/vim@82db31c
attachments.text: …en line Problem: Popup window for text property may show in first screen line. Solution: If the text position is invisible do not show the popup window. (closes #7807)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4223d43c0fb6ead1e611e4469a1680a9228b6015|patch 8.2.2490: 'wrap' option is always reset when starting diff mode>
patch 8.2.2490: 'wrap' option is always reset when starting diff mode

Problem:    'wrap' option is always reset when starting diff mode.
Solution:   Add the "followwrap" item in 'diffopt'. (Rick Howe, closes #7797)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2490: 'wrap' option is always reset when starting diff mode · vim/vim@4223d43
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2490: 'wrap' option is always reset when starting diff mode · vim/vim@4223d43
attachments.text: Problem: 'wrap' option is always reset when starting diff mode. Solution: Add the "followwrap" item in 'diffopt'. (Rick Howe, closes #7797)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/963ffa0a5a6091655ed72b4590ec5d5a1653bce8|patch 8.2.2489: current buffer is wrong after deletebufline() fails>
patch 8.2.2489: current buffer is wrong after deletebufline() fails

Problem:    current buffer is wrong after deletebufline() fails to delete a
            line in another buffer.
Solution:   Restore the current buffer.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2489: current buffer is wrong after deletebufline() fails · vim/vim@963ffa0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2489: current buffer is wrong after deletebufline() fails · vim/vim@963ffa0
attachments.text: Problem: current buffer is wrong after deletebufline() fails to delete a line in another buffer. Solution: Restore the current buffer.
